remarks: The sum of two finite sums.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsumadd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumadd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumadd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
fsumadd $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A ( B + C ) = ( sum_ k e. A B + sum_ k e. A C ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
